desc: We make women and kids sustainable surf and swimwear. Shop our mix & matchable surf and swimwear, including original Salt Gypsy surf leggings and Turtleneck rashguards. Sustainably manufactured in Australia from ECONYL® 100% regenerated nylon yarn and Italian stretch fabrics.

layout.text: We teamed up with the good folk behind new surf hat brand, Sunward Bound, on a limited edition surf hat.
